dcterms:description: The PAIP2019 dataset is used for liver cancer segmentation, providing a set of whole slide images (WSIs) that are scaled at a 5× magnification and cropped into patches for training, validation, and testing.
dcterms:title: PAIP2019

dcterms:creator: B. Ehteshami Bejnordi
M. Veta
P. Johannes van Diest
B. van Ginneken
N. Karssemeijer
G. Litjens
J.A.W.M. van der Laak
CAMELYON16 Consortium
dcterms:description: The CAMELYON16 dataset is utilized for the detection of lymph node metastases in women with breast cancer, consisting of whole slide images that are scaled at both 10× and 5× magnification.
dcterms:title: CAMELYON16
